list_definition.mean_english: xa trong không gian hay thời gian
list_definition.definition: far away or far apart, in place or time

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Our house is quite distant from the school.

list_ex_of_english: As a program administrator, he was distant from the details of the dynamics.
Cells most distant from the basement membrane showed no staining (white arrowhead).

In verbal interaction, the written word always remains a pervasive and authorized reference, but a shadowy and distant one.
Is the resemblance too distant to give the point any substantial interest?
